It's your turn, Rocky."},{"lineNumber":32639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ……何するだすか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh... what are you going to do?"},{"lineNumber":32640,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに、この胴に巻き付けられたロープは……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"And what's with this rope tied around my torso...?"},{"lineNumber":32641,"originalJapaneseLine":"「泳げ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Swim."},{"lineNumber":32642,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんぎゃーーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Aaghhhhh!?"},{"lineNumber":32643,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが躊躇なく、ロッキーを船から蹴り落とした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Without hesitation, Rance kicked Rocky off the boat."},{"lineNumber":32644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がぼごぼぶぶぶぶ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gulp gobble blub blub!"},{"lineNumber":32645,"originalJapaneseLine":"「沖まで何メートルくらいか測るぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll measure how many meters it is to the open sea!"},{"lineNumber":32646,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあいけ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now go!"},{"lineNumber":32647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばんずざ……がぼごぼぶぶぶぶ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Banzza... gulp gobble blub blub!"},{"lineNumber":32648,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………む？　おーい、進んでないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hmm? We have to save him..."},{"lineNumber":32657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあもう少しくらいは大丈夫だろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, he should be fine for a little longer."},{"lineNumber":32658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だだだ、だめですよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no no, you can't!"},{"lineNumber":32659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーもう。やっぱりロッキー君と遊ぶ会じゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, geez. This definitely isn't a get-together to play with Rocky."},{"lineNumber":32660,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひょいとベゼルアイが、ロープを掴んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Bezel Eye casually grabbed the rope."},{"lineNumber":32661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひょい」","translatedEnglishLine":"*swoosh*"},{"lineNumber":32662,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキーが一本釣りされて、海面から飛び出して","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky was pulled up like a single catch and leapt out of the water,"},{"lineNumber":32663,"originalJapaneseLine":"宙を舞った。","translatedEnglishLine":"soaring through the air."},{"lineNumber":32664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うう〜〜〜〜ん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"U-uuuuuuuuuuh..."},{"lineNumber":32665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ロ、ロッキーさん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, R-Rocky!"},{"lineNumber":32666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええと、水を吐かせないと……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh, we need to get him to spit out water...!"},{"lineNumber":32667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーむ。中々広大でしかも深いな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm. It's quite vast and also deep."},{"lineNumber":32668,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やるな、海」","translatedEnglishLine":"The sea's impressive."},{"lineNumber":32669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「船……もっとでかい船があればな。","translatedEnglishLine":"If only we had a boat... a bigger boat."},{"lineNumber":32670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　沖合いから向こうへ、行けそうな気がするが","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like we might be able to get past the offshore area."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、足元にまで波が来て…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the waves are coming right up to my feet...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く、汲んできただす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: K-kid, I brought some water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしいけ、ぐいっと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, go for it, gulp it down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どきどき…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thump thump...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーはコップを口元に持っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky brought the cup to his lips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、とーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, tooooooast!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、そのコップの底を不意打ちで持ち上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance suddenly lifted the bottom of the cup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごぼっ！？　ごぼぶばばばっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gulp!? Gulp bubbly bubbly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごふぅっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わははははははははは！　どうだ、味は！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wahahahahahaha! How's the taste!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、しょっからい、だすっ……げほっ、ごほっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-it's salty... *cough* *cough*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、大丈夫ですか！？　お水どうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A-are you alright!? Here's some water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ、すんませんだす……ごほっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, ah, sorry... *cough*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で……今日はロッキー君と遊ぶ会なの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So... is today a get-together to play with Rocky?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなわけはない。さあ本題だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not it. Now, onto the main topic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 船を出すぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're setting sail.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は近隣の村から小舟を借りて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others borrowed a small boat from a nearby village,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海に乗り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and headed out to sea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 波間を頼りなく揺れながら、船は沖合に出て行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The boat swayed unsteadily over the waves as it moved offshore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっとっとっと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa whoa whoa...
Eek...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゆ、ゆれ、ゆれるだすー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-it's shaking—it's shaking!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ、この小舟ではこの辺が限界か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I guess this small boat's limit is around here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し進んだ所で、ランスは船を漕ぐ手を止めさせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After moving a bit further, Rance stopped rowing the boat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲は見渡す限りの海原。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All around was the vast sea as far as the eye could see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沖へと目を遣っても、果ては見えない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking offshore, the end was nowhere in sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし。出番だぞロッキー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright. It's your turn, Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ……何するだすか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh... what are you going to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、この胴に巻き付けられたロープは……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And what's with this rope tied around my torso...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「泳げ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swim.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんぎゃーーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aaghhhhh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが躊躇なく、ロッキーを船から蹴り落とした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without hesitation, Rance kicked Rocky off the boat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がぼごぼぶぶぶぶ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gulp gobble blub blub!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「沖まで何メートルくらいか測るぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll measure how many meters it is to the open sea!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあいけ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばんずざ……がぼごぼぶぶぶぶ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Banzza... gulp gobble blub blub!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………む？　おーい、進んでないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hmm? Hey, you’re not moving forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーはそのまま沈んでいった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky sank down just like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、仕方がないな。先に深さを測るか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, can't be helped. I'll measure the depth first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーと繋げて船の片隅に積み上げられていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The rope tied to Rocky was piled in one corner of the boat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロープが、すごい速度で海の中に飛び込んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and plunged into the sea at an incredible speed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、え！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロ、ロッキーさん沈んでますよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: R-Rocky is sinking!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、けっこういくな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, it's going quite far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃ、じゃなくて！　助けないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no, wait! We have to save him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあもう少しくらいは大丈夫だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, he should be fine for a little longer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だだだ、だめですよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no no, you can't!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーもう。やっぱりロッキー君と遊ぶ会じゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, geez. This definitely isn't a get-together to play with Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひょいとベゼルアイが、ロープを掴んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bezel Eye casually grabbed the rope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひょい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *swoosh*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーが一本釣りされて、海面から飛び出して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky was pulled up like a single catch and leapt out of the water,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宙を舞った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: soaring through the air.
U-uuuuuuuuuuh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ロ、ロッキーさん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, R-Rocky!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええと、水を吐かせないと……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, we need to get him to spit out water...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ。中々広大でしかも深いな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm. It's quite vast and also deep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるな、海」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea's impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「船……もっとでかい船があればな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If only we had a boat... a bigger boat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沖合いから向こうへ、行けそうな気がするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like we might be able to get past the offshore area.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、足元にまで波が来て…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the waves are coming right up to my feet...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く、汲んできただす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: K-kid, I brought some water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしいけ、ぐいっと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, go for it, gulp it down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どきどき…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thump thump...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーはコップを口元に持っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky brought the cup to his lips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、とーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, tooooooast!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、そのコップの底を不意打ちで持ち上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance suddenly lifted the bottom of the cup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごぼっ！？　ごぼぶばばばっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gulp!? Gulp bubbly bubbly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごふぅっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わははははははははは！　どうだ、味は！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wahahahahahaha! How's the taste!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、しょっからい、だすっ……げほっ、ごほっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-it's salty... *cough* *cough*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、大丈夫ですか！？　お水どうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A-are you alright!? Here's some water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ、すんませんだす……ごほっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, ah, sorry... *cough*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で……今日はロッキー君と遊ぶ会なの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So... is today a get-together to play with Rocky?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなわけはない。さあ本題だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not it. Now, onto the main topic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 船を出すぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're setting sail.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は近隣の村から小舟を借りて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others borrowed a small boat from a nearby village,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海に乗り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and headed out to sea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 波間を頼りなく揺れながら、船は沖合に出て行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The boat swayed unsteadily over the waves as it moved offshore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっとっとっと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa whoa whoa...
Eek...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゆ、ゆれ、ゆれるだすー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-it's shaking—it's shaking!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ、この小舟ではこの辺が限界か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I guess this small boat's limit is around here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し進んだ所で、ランスは船を漕ぐ手を止めさせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After moving a bit further, Rance stopped rowing the boat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲は見渡す限りの海原。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All around was the vast sea as far as the eye could see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沖へと目を遣っても、果ては見えない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking offshore, the end was nowhere in sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし。出番だぞロッキー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright. It's your turn, Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ……何するだすか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh... what are you going to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、この胴に巻き付けられたロープは……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And what's with this rope tied around my torso...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「泳げ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swim.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんぎゃーーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aaghhhhh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが躊躇なく、ロッキーを船から蹴り落とした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without hesitation, Rance kicked Rocky off the boat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がぼごぼぶぶぶぶ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gulp gobble blub blub!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「沖まで何メートルくらいか測るぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll measure how many meters it is to the open sea!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあいけ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばんずざ……がぼごぼぶぶぶぶ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Banzza... gulp gobble blub blub!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………む？　おーい、進んでないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hmm? Hey, you’re not moving forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーはそのまま沈んでいった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky sank down just like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、仕方がないな。先に深さを測るか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, can't be helped. I'll measure the depth first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーと繋げて船の片隅に積み上げられていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The rope tied to Rocky was piled in one corner of the boat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロープが、すごい速度で海の中に飛び込んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and plunged into the sea at an incredible speed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、え！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロ、ロッキーさん沈んでますよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: R-Rocky is sinking!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、けっこういくな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, it's going quite far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃ、じゃなくて！　助けないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no, wait! We have to save him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあもう少しくらいは大丈夫だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, he should be fine for a little longer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だだだ、だめですよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no no, you can't!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーもう。やっぱりロッキー君と遊ぶ会じゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, geez. This definitely isn't a get-together to play with Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひょいとベゼルアイが、ロープを掴んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bezel Eye casually grabbed the rope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひょい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *swoosh*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーが一本釣りされて、海面から飛び出して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky was pulled up like a single catch and leapt out of the water,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宙を舞った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: soaring through the air.
U-uuuuuuuuuuh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ロ、ロッキーさん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, R-Rocky!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええと、水を吐かせないと……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, we need to get him to spit out water...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ。中々広大でしかも深いな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm. It's quite vast and also deep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるな、海」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea's impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「船……もっとでかい船があればな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If only we had a boat... a bigger boat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沖合いから向こうへ、行けそうな気がするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like we might be able to get past the offshore area.
